Characters: Steve Rogers X Teen!Reader

Universe: Marvel, Avengers

Warnings: Self-councious reader, mean students

Request: Marvel imagine where the reader comes home upset to Steve who’s kinda like a dad to her because she never feels like she’s good enough? Specifically when relationships and body confidence are involved?

Steve had dropped you off at your high school like he had several hundred times in the past few years. He never had to do it- you could simply catch the bus, but he still insisted. At first you thought he only did it to get him on your good side, but he still insisted, and now it was just normal for him to drive you to and from school unless you needed to stay behind or you wanted to go hang out with friends.

Steve had been the closest thing to a father figure for you in the recent years. You were a mutant who’d ran away from your family due to them not responding well to the revelation that you had powers, and they ended up calling the cops on you. Luckily it got SHIELD involved, and the one to find you was Steve. You were barely a teenager then, and Steve made it his mission to make sure you were never arrested and instead talked Fury into allowing you to be trained and protected by SHIELD. Eventually, when you’re old enough, you’d become part of the Avengers. For the time being however, you lived with one, and while you never called him dad, you’d made it obvious that you appreciated him as a father figure when you got him a card for Father’s day.

Steve in the past few weeks had been a little worried about you when it came to school- to be fair, he’d always been worried about your school life, especially when you started High School as a well-known mutant. That worry calmed down when you assured him that you’d made some friends who thought you were cool. But he still worried, whether it would be about homework that you’d been struggling with (he couldn’t exactly help you due to his school knowledge being decades old) or your grades, upcoming parent evening or even worrying he wouldn’t be able to get a night off to see something you’d be partaking in. However, so far it had worked out, and he was hoping this would be the same… but this time it felt different.

The School Dance was coming up, and you had shown some interest in it. You had even took up doing chores for the Avengers and for the people in surrounding flats for some money to put towards your dress, though that goal for the dress you wanted was quickly reached because Tony doesn’t understand the meaning of ‘a sensible amount of money’. However, not everything was ready yet. You didn’t have a date, and that was one of the things that Steve couldn’t help much with. He could drive you, pick you up and all that, but he couldn’t get a date for you. That was up to you and anyone at the school wanting to take you.

What particularly worried him about today was that you’d told him you’d be asking someone you liked if they’d like to go to the dance with you. He had given you a short protective talk on the way to school, but wished you luck.

He went through work, driving to your school and parking outside a little earlier than when the bell rang. He sat, waiting for only a few minutes till the bell rang. He looked out the window as students shuffled out, chatting, laughing and smiling, relieved that school was over and they were one day closer to the dance. That made you stand out to Steve. You were trudging along, your head hung and hugging your books close to you as you silently got into his car. Steve knew instantly something had happened, but he knew you weren’t ready to talk to him. “I’ve got some bucks spare… ice cream sound good?” He asked. You peeked your eyes at him, smiling weakly and nodding softly.

The drive was silent, and he did all the talking when you arrived to the parlour. You got a corner seat, and eventually Steve spoke up. “Okay… what happened?” He asked softly.

“…I don’t have a date.” You admitted dimly, messing with your ice cream and resting your arms on the table.

“Any particular reason?” He asked. You didn’t respond initially, only curling up more. “Y/N… come on sweetheart. You can tell me.” He assured. This was enough assurance for you.

“No one wants to go with me because I’m… fine. They called me a freak, and said they’d never give someone who looked like me a chance.” You admitted, and Steve’s heart dropped. His blood boiled. He was furious. But he didn’t show it. He instead put his arm across the table, taking your hand and rubbing his thumb across it, trying to reassure you.

“They’re both wrong and missing out. You are amazing, Y/N. They’ve known you for a lot less than I have, and I know they’re wrong by a long shot. If they’re that obsessed about how someone else looks, and over something you didn’t have a choice in having, then they’re the one with problems.” He assured you. You smiled weakly at him, being able to hold it. “…While I’m not one for parties… I’m pretty sure Tony would be alright with setting up a much more extravagant party than what your school can put together, and make you the princess of the ball… to be fair he’s been bugging me about it for weeks so…” That made you laugh, knowing it was probably true.

“That sounds great. I have a feeling he will constantly be sprouting about me being an Avenger in training.” You commented, giving Steve an opportunity to laugh. “You always know how to make me feel better. Thank you. I’m happy I’m lucky to have someone as amazing as you as a father figure.” Now that just made him feel like the proudest man in the world.

Hope you like it! If you have any questions, please send them in! 

*Not my gif

summary: I'll keep you safe.
body:
I’ll keep you safe.

AN: This is the first chapter of a Bruce x reader story that would not leave me alone. So please enjoy and tell me if I should continue. I’ve never wrote for Bruce before so I’m sorry if I got something wrong.

Bruce sat at the bar of Avengers Tower; Tony was throwing one of his victory parties. He really didn’t want to be there, but only came because Clint threatened to tell Y/N about his crush on her which he vehemently denied. Lifting the drink to his mouth he felt the warm liquid glide down his throat.

“Is anyone sitting here?” A voice beside him asked. He didn’t even have to look to know it was Y/N. Putting a smile on his face he motioned for her to sit down.  He found that he couldn’t help but stare. Her H/C hair was in a neat bun with a few ringlets framing her face. She was wearing a medium length red dress.

Trying to look away he focused his attention back to his drink. “So are you being blackmailed into this party too?” Y/N voice spoke up again. He looked at her with curiosity wondering what she was being blackmailed about but he didn’t want to seem like he was being nosey.

“No I thought it was a good idea to get away from the lab.” As soon as the words left his mouth he didn’t believe them himself. The look on her face suggested she didn’t buy it either.  Looking for a change of topic he remembered something.

“So you’re going out to Florida to help Pepper with something?”  Just the mention of her job she smiled. “Yeah I’m going to help redesign the new Avengers safehouses out there.”  Y/N was Tony’s sister but she started to work with Shield once the Avengers were formed he brought her on as a designer for all the new rooms in the Avengers Tower.

He nodded not sure what else to say.  “So Y/N you wouldn’t be over here flirting with Banner would you?”  A voice from behind him joked. Bruce watched as her face turned to a playful scrawl but it didn’t do much to Tony who came over laughing. Bruce tried his best to hide his blush.

Tony didn’t know anything about his crush which he was grateful for, but looking over he saw Clint smiling in his direction. Bruce wished he would just stop. because nothing was ever going to happen between him and yourself.

Turning back around he saw that you and Tony had walked off and was sitting at the couch with everyone else. Going over to the empty chair he took a seat and listened as Thor was telling a story about some battle he had been in. Bruce was only half listening when he saw that you had stood up to go upstairs probably to get ready to leave he thought. He felt a tightness in his chest as he thought about not seeing you for the next 8 weeks.

Ignoring his chest he turned his attention back to Thor saying how he hit some alien with his hammer or something like that. Bruce’s thoughts kept drifting back to you as he realized he won’t see your smiling face in the morning getting coffee or hear your voice sing a little off key while singing around the tower and he realized his feelings for you were much stronger than he initially thought but he knew he could never tell you. He didn’t want you to be in danger because of the other guy and he didn’t think Tony would like one of his teammates dating his sister.

Hearing “Tony you better just get it over with.” Coming from Rhodey he followed the man’s gaze to see you coming down the stairs in a pair of old jeans and a modest top. Your hair was hanging down now.  Bruce thought he looked so much better this way than all glammed up at parties.

He watched as Tony reluctantly stood up and walked over to where Y/N stood and held out his arms she returned the gesture and closed the distance between them. Everyone around the siblings was watching the exchange with smiles on their faces.  Pulling apart he saw that Tony was really going to miss his sister. Y/N the went around the room saying her goodbyes and giving everyone hugs. She came up to him last and wrapped her arms around him he slowly did the same; it felt odd to have another human being touch him.  

“I’m going to miss you but once I get back I’m determined to know the mystery that is Dr. Bruce Banner.” She joked her hot breath right in his ear.  Pulling away he watched as she went out the door to have the driver take her to the airport.

it had been about twenty minutes since you left but he kept replaying what Y/N had said to him and couldn’t help but wonder what you meant by that.  His thoughts were interrupted when JARVIS voice came out of the speaker from above.

“Sir I’m afraid there are two police officers at the door.” Everyone in the room got quiet after that. Tony was the first to react “Have they said why they are here?”  The AI responded, “No but they said it was an emergency that they talk to you.” Now everyone’s eyes were on Tony as he hurried to the door to find out what the trouble was. His mind started to wonder one thing much worse than the last. What if something happened and you were in the hospital. The silence in the room was cut through when a scream was emitted into the air. everyone went to see what the trouble was. Bruce came around the corner with everyone else the sight was quite worrisome with Tony on his knees and his hand over his mouth sobbing.  

Bruce felt a knot in his stomach . Rhodey went to his friend to see what the problem was. Bruce never thought he would hear those words especially not tonight but when he saw the man’s face look up at them he knew it wasn’t good news. “Y/N is dead.“                                                                                                                

AN: So please tell me what you think will only continue if enough people seem interested. Chapter 2 has been uploaded.

His mind started to wonder one thing much worse than the last. What if something happened and you were in the hospital. The silence in the room was cut through when a scream was emitted into the air. everyone went to see what the trouble was. Bruce came around the corner with everyone else the sight was quite worrisome with Tony on his knees and his hand over his mouth sobbing.  

Bruce felt a knot in his stomach . Rhodey went to his friend to see what the problem was. Bruce never thought he would hear those words especially not tonight but when he saw the man’s face look up at them he knew it wasn’t good news. “Y/N is dead.“

summary: Being in the marvel and dc cinematic universe, keeping up with multiple shows, and watching them all completely put of order,...
body:
Being in the marvel and dc cinematic universe, keeping up with multiple shows, and watching them all completely put of order, AND adding fanfiction to the mix is so confusing. ‘Oh hey brain, i keep forgetting, what was that super cute moment between Ray and Clint?’ And my brain going ‘Wyatt you fool, Ray is DC’ and me responding ‘Then was this a fanfiction?’ And then me going on an hour long hunt for this fanfiction I’m honestly not sure exists is wild

Not to mention the terms? I keep seeing CW and my brain goes ‘Its been two years since CW, we only have team alive and team dead now’ and ‘Oh that arrowverse term i know nothing about’ at the same time
